LanguageData.GFL_Weapon_Hestia.label: Hestia
LanguageData.GFL_Weapon_Hestia.description:
A reliable CZ75 pistol with integrated tactical systems. This sidearm excels at applying devastating debuffs through precise shots, stacking vulnerabilities on targets before delivering a crushing final blow.

Equipped with two abilities:
- Fissioned Firelight: Apply defense-shredding Rend stacks while building momentum
- No Survivors: Consume stacked Rend to spread lethal Gash effects across all marked targets
LanguageData.GFL_Ability_FissionedFirelight.label: Fissioned Firelight
LanguageData.GFL_Ability_FissionedFirelight.descripti:
Fire a precision shot that deals 120% weapon damage and applies 2 stacks of Rend (max 8) to the target. Each successful hit grants the caster +2 Confectance Index.

Rend Effect: +30% physical damage taken per stack

Cooldown: 18 seconds (1080 ticks)
Range: 6 tiles
Damage Type: Bullet
Skill Scaling: +1% damage per Shooting level
LanguageData.GFL_Ability_NoSurvivors.label: No Survivors
LanguageData.GFL_Ability_NoSurvivors.description:
Unleash a devastating execution attack that deals 160% weapon damage to the primary target. All enemies within 6 tiles that have Rend stacks receive Gash stacks equal to the primary target's Rend count.

If the primary target has 6+ Rend stacks, consume 6 stacks and gain +120% bonus damage (total 280% weapon damage).

Gash Effect: 8% applier attack per stack every second, consumes 2 stacks per tick

Cooldown: 2 minutes (7200 ticks)
Range: 6 tiles
AoE: 6 tiles (Gash spread)
Damage Type: Bullet
Skill Scaling: +1% damage per Shooting level
LanguageData.GFL_Hediff_Rend.label: rend
LanguageData.GFL_Hediff_Rend.description:
Deep lacerations that expose vulnerable tissue. Each stack increases physical damage taken by 30%, making the victim increasingly susceptible to attacks.

Max Stacks: 8
Damage Vulnerability: +30% per stack (formula: 1 + 0.30 * stacks)
Duration: 15 seconds (900 ticks, refreshes on new stacks)
Affects: Bullet, Cut, Stab, Blunt, Arrow, Scratch, Bite, Crush damage
LanguageData.GFL_Hediff_Gash.label: gash
LanguageData.GFL_Hediff_Gash.description:
Bleeding wounds that continuously drain vitality. Deals periodic damage based on the applier's attack power and consumes 2 stacks with each damage tick.

Damage Formula: applierAttack * 0.08 * stacks
Tick Interval: 60 ticks (1 second)
Stack Consumption: 2 per tick
Duration: Until stacks fully depleted
Damage Type: Cut
LanguageData.GFL_Hediff_ConfectanceIndex_Hestia.label: confectance index
LanguageData.GFL_Hediff_ConfectanceIndex_Hestia.descr:
Combat momentum accumulated through precise strikes with Hestia. Each point represents tactical advantage that can be leveraged for devastating ultimate attacks.

Generation: +2 per Fissioned Firelight hit
Consumption: Read by No Survivors ability (informational, not consumed)
Duration: 60 seconds (3600 ticks, refreshes on new stacks)
LanguageData.Make_GFL_Weapon_Hestia.label: make Hestia pistol
LanguageData.Make_GFL_Weapon_Hestia.description: Craft a Hestia (CZ75) tactical pistol with integrated debuff application systems.
